name: BitOK
shortDescription: Portfolio tracker with AML and Tax perks
description: BitOK enables users to (a) monitor all wallet activity including DeFi; (b) add private notes, files and tags to any transaction; (c) calculate taxes; (d) generate tax forms and other documents for banks/exchanges; (e) mitigate AML risks. BitOK supports 50+ wallets (custodial and non-custodial), exchanges and blockchains, including Moonbeam and Moonriver.
